## StandardCardProps.fieldMappings property

Custom mappings for the data fields used in the card.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fieldMappings?: {
        title?: FieldData;
        description?: FieldData;
        cta1?: FieldData;
        cta2?: FieldData;
    };
```
